attributes.action: Help save the RAVEN pub in culcheth
attributes.background: Here’s an extract regarding the Raven taken from the “Historic Culcheth” by Rosemary Keery. Built in 1562, 457Years old, still standing and planning permission is being sought to demolish it to build ten new houses. Surely with its history it should be protected as an important community asset!!?

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Planning decisions are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
